body_html:
Good day for everyone
I have the same problem with the script on Windows 7

python retrain.py
--bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks
--how_many_training_steps=500
--model_dir=/tf_files/inception
--summaries_dir=/tf_files/training_summaries
--output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb
--output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt
--image_dir ???

"No valid folders or images found at"
I have tried different variants, but no successful results
--image_dir d:\tfi
--image_dir c:/Users/Alexei/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python35/tf_files/bottles/
--image_dir=/tf_files/bottles

body:
Good day for everyone
I have the same problem with the script on Windows 7

python retrain.py \
  --bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks \
  --how_many_training_steps=500 \
  --model_dir=/tf_files/inception \
  --summaries_dir=/tf_files/training_summaries
  --output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb \
  --output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt \
  --image_dir ???

"No valid folders or images found at"
I have tried different variants, but no successful results
  --image_dir d:\tfi\
  --image_dir c:/Users/Alexei/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python35/tf_files/bottles/
  --image_dir=/tf_files/bottles
